course_description: This course introduces the basics of programming using Python.
learning_outcomes: Understand variables, control structures, data types, and functions.
important_topics: Variables and Data Types; Loops; Conditional Statements; Functions; Lists and Dictionaries

course_description: Fundamental concepts of calculus including limits, derivatives, and integrals.
learning_outcomes: Solve limits, derivatives, and integrals problems.
important_topics: Limits; Derivatives; Integration; Chain Rule; Fundamental Theorem of Calculus

course_description: Develop academic writing skills for essays, research, and reports.
learning_outcomes: Structure arguments, use citations, avoid plagiarism.
important_topics: Thesis Statement; Argumentation; Citation Styles; Avoiding Plagiarism; Paragraph Structure

course_description: Overview of biological principles from cells to ecosystems.
learning_outcomes: Explain cellular processes and ecosystem interactions.
important_topics: Cell Structure; Photosynthesis; Genetics; Evolution; Ecosystems
